name: No. 7
description:
Money is not everything ,  we can win games without money also... so give your money and win the game. But it is not that simple , use your strategy to win the game.

It is a dice game, you start with 7 coins, where you play dice and send same amount of coins to opponent, so your coins can will be reduced.

Currently this is local multiplayer game with max 6 players supported.
